title: Source: U-M launches athletic department query
content: The University of Michigan has commissioned an investigation into its athletic department, centering on how numerous scandals have both occurred and been handled in recent years, a source told ESPN.

title: Cowboys keep CB Diggs on IR for Vikings game
content: The Cowboys did not activate CB Trevon Diggs from IR for Sunday's game against the Vikings despite his participation in practice this week.

title: Hawks' Young should return to practice next week
content: Atlanta Hawks star Trae Young, who is averaging 17.8 points and 7.8 assists but has been out with a right knee MCL sprain since suffering the injury against the Brooklyn Nets on Oct. 29, is expected to return to practice next week, the team announced.

title: Rivers activated, eligible to play vs. Seahawks
content: The Colts elevated the newly unretired quarterback from the practice squad to the 53-man active roster Saturday, making him officially eligible to play Sunday against the Seahawks.

title: Sources: Sellers finalizing return to South Carolina
content: South Carolina quarterback LaNorris Sellers is nearing a deal to return to the school for 2026, sources told ESPN's Pete Thamel.

title: Sources: Mets, IF Polanco agree on 2-year pact
content: The Mets and infielder Jorge Polanco have agreed on a two-year, $40 million contract, sources told ESPN. Polanco is expected to primarily play first base, replacing Pete Alonso, who left in free agency.

title: Blackhawks recall Lardis following Bedard injury
content: The Chicago Blackhawks have recalled high-scoring forward Nick Lardis from the minors a day after Connor Bedard got hurt in the final seconds of a loss at St. Louis.

title: Salah makes EPL history on Liverpool return
content: Mohamed Salah came off the bench after just 25 minutes for Liverpool's Premier League clash with Brighton & Hove Albion.

title: üëÄThe many shirts of John Cena's WWE career
content: Before John Cena's final match, take a look back at his legendary career through the lens of his iconic shirts.

title: A reason (or two) to watch every one of this year's bowl games
content: With first-year success stories, chances at redemption and general silliness, college football bowl season always delivers.

title: Live updates from NBA Cup semifinals between Magic-Knicks, Spurs-Thunder in Vegas
content: The top moments, highlights from the NBA Cup semifinals in Las Vegas between the Magic and Knicks, then Spurs and Thunder.

title: Last-minute prep on NFL Week 15: We have sleepers, QB questions, trends to watch and more
content: Big day for Ladd McConkey? Fantasy upside for Isaiah Likely? An advantage for Drake Maye? Lofty stat predictions for Christian Watson? Let's look at Week 15.

title: Untold stories of Detroit Lions QB Jared Goff
content: Goff has a toughness that belies his California cool demeanor. Four stories that explain the Lions QB, from those who know him best.

title: Expert picks, best bets: Royval's path to victory at UFC Fight Night
content: Where's the value on the final UFC fight card of the year? MMA insiders and a betting expert make their picks for Brandon Royval vs. Manel Kape.

title: Salah's farewell? If this was his final Liverpool chapter, he delivered a fitting end
content: As transfer rumors swirl, Mohamed Salah's dynamic display vs. Brighton showed just how much he still has to offer.

title: What is dry needling and what happened to T.J. Watt? Answering key questions
content: Is dry needling common for NFL players? How long will the Steelers star be sidelined? Here's what we know.

title: Who is willing to spend to keep up with the Dodgers and Blue Jays this winter?
content: Baseball insiders were abuzz over L.A. and Toronto at this week's winter meetings, as both have the money -- and pull -- to dominate the winter.

title: NBA 25 under 25: The best young stars, ranked by future potential
content: Which youngsters are among the next class of superstars? Which are already there? Our NBA experts rank their top 25 under 25.

title: Has trading for a superstar become too risky? League insiders examine the new normal
content: One big trade away from title contention? You better be right, because the consequences have never been harsher.

title: Big East Bracketology preview: NCAA tournament predictions for every team
content: UConn has separated itself from St. John's. Three more teams look bubble bound. And one potential sleeper.

title: NFL playoff picture: Updated projections, chances to make the postseason
content: We're looking ahead to how the 14-team playoff picture could line up -- and who will win divisions -- en route to Super Bowl LX.

title: Don't be surprised if ... Brock Purdy, Chase Brown are league winners down the stretch
content: With the upcoming schedule, don't be surprised if Brock Purdy and Chase Brown are difference-makers down the stretch.

title: The best and worst soccer statues ever (now including a 70-foot Messi)
content: Having a statue in your honor is a mixed bag if you're a legendary soccer player. It can be either a life-affirming blessing or a hideous curse.

title: Transfer rumors, news: Chelsea lead Man United, Newcastle in Smit race
content: Chelsea are the front-runners in the race to sign AZ Alkmaar wunderkind Kees Smit. Transfer Talk has the latest news and rumors.

title: "Punjab Gripped By Fear": Opposition Ahead Of Rural Body Polls
content: A day before rural polls in Punjab, incidents of crime in Jalandhar have been raised by the opposition to flag the law and order situation in the state.

title: 'Pins On Map': How Chicago Students Are Tracking Immigration Raids
content: Student and veteran journalists say that college newsrooms, independent media and legacy outlets across Chicago are now working together in ways that upend decades of cutthroat competition, building tools to track enforcement and collaborating on inf

title: "Gift Of Hope": King Charles' Message To Public Amid Cancer Treatment
content: King Charles III has been "deeply touched" by the response to his update on his cancer treatment, Buckingham Palace said Saturday, adding that the monarch is pleased to have highlighted the value of screening programs for the disease.

title: Election 5 Months Away, MK Stalin Expands Rs 1,000 Scheme For Women In Tamil Nadu
content: With assembly elections due in five months, Tamil Nadu Chief Minister MK Stalin launched the second phase of the Kalaignar Magalir Urimai Thittam (KMUT), expanding the flagship women's rights entitlement scheme to benefit an additional 17 lakh women.

title: Luthra Brothers Booked Thailand Tickets While Their Nightclub Was On Fire
content: The probe into the nightclub inferno in Goa has uncovered new evidence indicating that the owners, brothers Saurabh and Gaurav Luthra, booked flight tickets to Thailand at the very moment emergency services were trying to control the blaze.

title: Goa Nightclub Owner Used SIM Card In Name Of Driver He Fired In 2020
content: New revelations surrounding Saurabh and Gaurav Luthra -- principal owners of Goa's Birch by Romeo Lane nightclub, where 25 people were killed in a devastating fire on December 6 -- have intensified scrutiny of their movements, assets, and conduct.

title: How Stepping Out For A Meal Became Luthra Brothers' Undoing In Thailand
content: Gaurav and Saurav Luthra, soon to be deported to India in connection with the Goa nightclub fire that killed 25 people, stepped out of their hotel in Thailand for a meal.

title: US Tightens Immigration Rules, Bars Old Photos To Curb Identity Fraud
content: The US Citizenship and Immigration Services (USCIS) has tightened its rules on photographs used for immigration paperwork, introducing stricter limits aimed at reducing identity fraud.

title: Company Threatens To Exit Rs 3,700 Crore J&K Project, Cites 'Interference'
content: The construction company building the 850 MW Rattle Hydropower project in Jammu and Kashmir's Kishtwar district announced on Saturday that it may have to abandon the Rs 3,700 crore project due to persistent political interference.

title: 'Will Keep Every Promise': Mohan Yadav On 2 Years In Power In Madhya Pradesh
content: The BJP government led by Chief Minister Dr Mohan Yadav completed two years in office on Saturday. Just two days before that, on Thursday, Madhya Pradesh achieved a historic milestone by being declared Maoist-free, bringing an end to nearly 35 years

title: 45-Year-Old Woman Mauled To Death By Tiger In Maharashtra
content: A 45-year-old woman was killed by a tiger in Maharashtra's Chandrapur district on Saturday, officials said.

title: Manipur BJP MLAs Called To Delhi Amid Buzz Over Government Formation
content: The BJP has called its Manipur MLAs to Delhi amid speculation over a possible change in the state's political landscape. The state has been under the President's rule since February.

title: Odisha Student, 14, Brings Revolver To Classroom, Threatens Headmaster: Cops
content: The Odisha Police on Saturday took a 14-year-old boy into custody in Kendrapara, after he threatened his school headmaster inside the classroom by allegedly brandishing a country-made revolver.

title: 2 US Soldiers, 1 Civilian Killed In Syria By ISIS Gunman
content: Three Americans were killed Saturday in Syria in an ambush attack by an Islamic State group member, US Central Command said.

title: Terrorist Masood Azhar Recalls Failed Jailbreak In Jammu, And The Thrashing That Followed
content: Masood Azhar, the chief of the Pakistan-based terror group Jaish-e-Mohammed (JeM), has admitted he paid a high price for trying to escape from jail in Jammu and Kashmir in the 1990s.

title: SIR To 'Babri': How Trinamool Plans To Counter Polarisation Ahead Of Bengal Polls
content: A 'Babri Masjid' plan by now-suspended Trinamool Congress MLA Humayun Kabir in Murshidabad district has added yet another dimension to what will probably be next year's most aggressively contested Assembly elections in West Bengal.

title: "Rattled": Ex Haryana Ally JJP Hits Out At BJP After Security Cover Withdrawn
content: The Haryana Police's recent security pruning exercise has triggered a political slugfest, riling the BJP's former ally, the Jannayak Janta Party.

title: Lizard Found In Odisha School Meal, 98 Students Fall Ill
content: At least 98 students fell ill after consuming food contaminated with a lizard in a school in Odisha's Koraput district on Saturday.

title: Shivraj Chouhan's 'Mama Ka Ghar' Turns Fortress Amid Potential ISI Threat
content: Security was tightened outside Union Minister Shivraj Singh Chouhan's residences in Bhopal and Delhi on Friday after intelligence inputs warned of a potential threat to him from Pakistan's spy agency Inter-Services Intelligence.

title: Schools Till Class 11 In Hybrid Mode, 50% WFH In Offices As Delhi Chokes
content: The Delhi government has directed 50% of its employees as well as staff in private offices to work from home as stricter pollution norms under the Graded Response Action Plan (GRAP) Stage 4 came into effect on Saturday.

title: Chaos & screams: 8 stampedes, 127 dead ‚Äî The anatomy of India's crowd tragedies in 2025
content: India witnessed a grim year in 2025 with eight stampedes claiming 127 lives across various public gatherings. From religious sites to railway stations and political rallies, overcrowding and poor planning turned joyous occasions into tragedies. These preventable incidents highlight critical gaps in crowd safety management nationwide.

title: Smiles, pics, football: After Kolkata chaos, Hyderabad shows how to host Messi
content: Lionel Messi's GOAT India Tour proceeded smoothly in Hyderabad after a chaotic start in Kolkata. The Argentine star participated in a penalty shootout and football clinics for children, receiving a warm welcome from fans and dignitaries. Messi will continue his tour in Mumbai and conclude in New Delhi with a meeting with Prime Minister Narendra Modi.

title: 'Goldilocks' economy: India in a rare 'sweet spot'; do you stand to gain?
content: India is experiencing a rare economic phase with near-zero inflation and robust growth exceeding 8%. While this 'Goldilocks' moment benefits borrowers and large corporations, farmers face significant losses due to falling food prices. Savers might see reduced returns as interest rates decline, highlighting a complex economic landscape where benefits are unevenly distributed.

title: Cisco CFO Patterson makes fun of HP Enterprise, says: The networking company you bought for..
content: Cisco's CFO Mark Patterson highlighted market uncertainty stemming from Hewlett Packard Enterprise's $14 billion Juniper acquisition. He suggested this integration, particularly in wireless, is causing customer confusion, which Cisco is capitalizing on. This echoes previous Cisco sentiments about the deal's disruptive potential for enterprise clients.

title: Syria: 2 US soldiers killed; Islamic State launches ambush
content: In central Syria an ISIS gunman ambushed US forces near Palmyra, claiming the lives of two American service members and one civilian. Three other troops sustained injuries in the attack. The gunman was neutralized by forces. This incident marks the first US casualties in Syria since a significant political shift a year ago.

title: AI browser battle: Google unveils Disco; Highlights gaps in OpenAI‚Äôs Atlas
content: Google unveils Disco, an experimental browser that transforms browsing activity into custom web applications using its Gemini 3 AI. This  approach, powered by GenTabs, directly challenges AI browsers like OpenAI's Atlas by building apps rather than just adding chatbots.  Disco aims to redefine browser functionality with AI at its core, offering a glimpse into the future of web navigation.

title: T.J. Watt injury opens door for rookie Jack Sawyer in key Week 15 matchup
content: The Pittsburgh Steelers face a critical Week 15 game without star linebacker T.J. Watt, who is recovering from surgery. Rookie Jack Sawyer is set to see an increased workload, with his pass-rushing potential highlighted as a key factor in compensating for Watt's absence against the Miami Dolphins.

title: Climate migration begins: Tuvaluans relocate to Australia; special visas take effect
content: Australia has welcomed the first climate migrants from Tuvalu, a Pacific nation facing inundation due to rising sea levels. A groundbreaking bilateral treaty allows Tuvaluans to live, study, and work in Australia, offering "mobility with dignity" as climate impacts worsen. This initiative marks a significant step in addressing climate-induced displacement.

title: Sudan war: Terrorists attack UN base; 6 killed
content: A deadly drone strike on a UN facility in Sudan's South Kordofan region has claimed at least six lives, according to a medical source. The attack, which eyewitnesses attribute to a drone, occurred in Kadugli, a city facing severe humanitarian crises. Sudan's government has condemned the incident, accusing the paramilitary Rapid Support Forces (RSF) of responsibility.

title: Dwyane Wade Says ‚ÄúI‚Äôll Miss Him‚Äù in Emotional Tribute to LeBron James
content: Dwyane Wade, reflecting on LeBron James' 23rd NBA season, expresses admiration and a fan's perspective on an impending era's end.  He acknowledges James' elite performance, even as fans call for retirement, and cherishes their shared championship history. Wade also humorously recalls the 'Big Three' introduction, highlighting the immense pressure and difficulty of winning.

title: David and Victoria Beckham net worth 2025: Football, fashion, business
content: Power couple David and Victoria Beckham boast a combined net worth of $900 million in 2025. David's fortune stems from his legendary football career and lucrative endorsements, while Victoria built hers through successful fashion and beauty empires.  Together, they manage valuable brands, support their family, and remain influential figures in global sports and fashion.

title: Messi chaos fallout: Bengal governor fumes over denied stadium entry, says ‚Äònot a rubber stamp‚Äô
content: West Bengal governor C V Ananda Bose was denied entry to Salt Lake stadium after chaos erupted during a Lionel Messi event. He deemed the incident an affront to his constitutional office and sought an explanation, vowing to inspect the site to finalize his report. The Governor also demanded accountability for the mismanagement and police failures.

title: 8th Pay Commission: Railways to trim costs; maintenance, procurement, energy sectors in focus
content: Indian Railways is implementing significant cost-cutting measures in maintenance, procurement, and energy to bolster its finances. This proactive approach aims to absorb anticipated wage increases from the Eighth Pay Commission, projected to be substantial. The railway is focusing on operational efficiency and increased freight revenue to manage the financial impact.

title: Justin Herbert injury update: Chargers QB shares concern ahead of Chiefs matchup
content: Los Angeles Chargers quarterback Justin Herbert is dealing with a worsening left hand injury following surgery, despite playing in a recent win. He described the hand as sore after playing and falling on it, leading to limited practice. However, the latest injury report suggests he may be ready to play against the Kansas City Chiefs.

title: Gas chamber: GRAP 3 fails, strictest curbs now in force in Delhi; what's restricted
content: Delhi-NCR faces emergency curbs as air quality plummets to 'Severe+' levels, triggering Stage IV of the Graded Response Action Plan. Authorities have enforced strict restrictions across the region due to pollution crossing critical thresholds. This comes after the city's Air Quality Index surged overnight, leading to dense smog and reduced visibility, impacting public health.

title: Boomers stay late, Millennials burn out, GenZ set boundaries: Welcome to work life in 2025
content: Modern offices are a melting pot of Boomers, Millennials, and Gen Z, each with distinct communication styles and work philosophies. While generational differences create unique workplace dynamics, from email etiquette to work-life balance, collaboration and innovation thrive. HR professionals now navigate these diverse expectations, fostering an environment where all generations contribute effectively.

title: Arjun Rampal confirms engagement to Gabriella Demetriades after 6 years of togetherness
content: Arjun Rampal, who is currently riding high on the success of his latest theatrical release Dhurandhar, just made his relationship milestone official. The actor, who plays Major Iqbal in the film released on December 5 and is set to cross the Rs 300 crore mark at the box office, appears to have confirmed his engagement to longtime partner, fashion designer Gabriella Demetriades.

title: Karnataka ex-min‚Äôs SUV mows down man; victim‚Äôs family alleges Revanna‚Äôs son at wheel
content: A 23-year-old factory worker was fatally hit by an SUV owned by former Karnataka minister HM Revanna's son, Shashank. While family members alleged Shashank was driving, Revanna claimed their driver was at the wheel. The SUV reportedly fled the scene but was later stopped by locals.

title: Nick Fuentes warns he‚Äôll expose Candace Owens if TPUSA livestream fails
content: Nick Fuentes has issued a stern warning to Turning Point USA, threatening to expose Candace Owens if their December 15 livestream fails to adequately address her unproven claims about Charlie Kirk's death. Fuentes stated he will livestream his own expos√©, naming names and providing evidence, if TPUSA does not handle the situation properly.

title: 'Unwanted VIPs': Indian legend Bhutia on Messi's Kolkata event fiasco
content: Former Indian football captain Bhaichung Bhutia criticized VIP culture at Lionel Messi's Kolkata event, where genuine fans were denied access. The GOAT Tour's Kolkata leg saw fans express anger through vandalism after expensive tickets failed to guarantee a proper viewing of the star, leading to an organizer's arrest and a government investigation.

title: A Messi affair: What led to the chaos at Kolkata's Salt Lake Stadium?
content: Lionel Messi's highly anticipated G.O.A.T. Tour stop in Kolkata was marred by chaos due to poor crowd management and security lapses. Thousands of fans were left disappointed as the event was cut short, with objects thrown and chairs damaged amid visible anger.

title: Fact-check: Viral hoax drags Bronny James into pregnancy speculation
content: A viral X post claimed LeBron James' son Bronny James is expecting a child with girlfriend Parker Whitfield, but the rumor lacks substantiation and is believed to be a diversion. Bronny and Parker, who have been dating since August 2024, are a popular couple, with Bronny expressing his affection for her on Instagram.

title: Woman, two sons found dead in Kalkaji home; suicide note reveals financial woes
content: A tragic discovery in Kalkaji, Delhi, where a 52-year-old woman and her two sons were found deceased. Police suspect suicide, citing an alleged note that points to severe financial and personal struggles. The family's dire situation, including unpaid rent and unemployment, may have led to this heartbreaking outcome. Investigations are ongoing.

title: Akhlaq lynching case: Left seeks Prez's intervention; UP govt moves to withdraw case
content: CPI(M) leader Brinda Karat has urged President Murmu to intervene against the Uttar Pradesh government's move to withdraw charges in the 2015 Dadri mob lynching of Mohammad Akhlaq. Karat termed the governor's approval of the withdrawal a "politically motivated" attempt to subvert justice, questioning the governor's constitutional duty to uphold the rule of law.

title: Explosion near naval ammo facility: 30 houses develop cracks in Karnataka villages
content: A powerful explosion near the Indian Navy's ammunition storage facility in Uttara Kannada district caused significant alarm, with over 30 houses developing cracks and windows rattling in nearby villages. Residents described the blast as deafening, prompting immediate damage assessment by local authorities. The exact cause and origin of the incident remain unconfirmed.

title: 'Cannot bulldoze court': CBI counters Rabri Devi: opposes transfer of cases
content: The CBI opposed Rabri Devi's plea to transfer criminal cases, arguing it constitutes "forum-shopping" and aims to demean the judge. The agency stated that Special Judge Vishal Gogne acted within judicial procedures and that the application seeks to stall the trial. The court will hear the matter further on December 15, 2025.

title: 'Shame on you Mamata!' BJP tears into CM over Messi event mess; makes 3 demands
content: Chaos erupted at Salt Lake stadium during Lionel Messi's visit, sparking a sharp BJP attack on West Bengal CM Mamata Banerjee. Opposition leader Suvendu Adhikari accused the state government of gross mismanagement and demanded Banerjee's resignation, citing fan disappointment and alleged exploitation. Banerjee has ordered a high-level inquiry into the incident.

title: Biggest IPO ever? Insider share sale sets SpaceX valuation at $800 bn
content: SpaceX is reportedly conducting an internal share sale valuing the company at $800 billion, with a potential 2026 IPO in the works. This valuation, nearly double its previous figure, surpasses OpenAI's record and positions SpaceX as the world's most valuable private firm. Funds will fuel Starship development, AI data centers, and lunar base initiatives.

title: WB sports minister reacts to chaos during Messi's visit - 'I will not ...'
content: West Bengal Sports Minister Aroop Biswas announced an investigation into the chaotic events at Salt Lake Stadium during Lionel Messi's GOAT Tour. Fans reacted with disappointment and unrest after Messi's early departure, leading to property damage and police intervention. The All India Football Federation clarified its non-involvement in the privately organized event.

title: 'Dhurandhar' box office day 9: Crosses Rs 255 crore mark
content: Ranveer Singh's 'Dhurandhar' is a box office hit, crossing Rs 290 crore by its ninth day. Director Rohit Shetty lauded the film as 'naya Hindi cinema.' The movie boasts a strong ensemble cast and has garnered significant audience appreciation, particularly for Ranveer's intense portrayal and Akshaye Khanna's memorable introduction.

title: BJP leader Sheetal Angural‚Äôs nephew murdered; accused flees after stabbing him in chest
content: A 17-year-old boy, nephew of former Jalandhar West MLA Sheetal Angural, was fatally stabbed in Jalandhar. The victim, Vikas Angural, was attacked by a man identified as Kalu and accomplices. The former MLA alleges the main accused is a drug peddler, highlighting the area's drug problem. Police are investigating the incident.

title: Messi's Kolkata tour chaos: Bengal cops detain organiser; tickets to be refunded
content: Chaos erupted at Kolkata's Salt Lake stadium as thousands of fans protested after a brief, tightly controlled appearance by Lionel Messi. The West Bengal Police detained the main event organizer, with authorities promising ticket refunds and strict action against those responsible for the mismanagement.

title: K'taka CM tussle: Another Cong MLA predicts DKS will get top post; reveals dates
content: Congress MLA H A Iqbal Hussain claimed D K Shivakumar will become Chief Minister on January 6, urging CM Siddaramaiah to step down. This follows a dinner meeting hosted by Shivakumar with over 30 legislators and ministers, fueling speculation about a leadership transition pact made after the 2023 election victory.

title: How Kolkata‚Äôs wait for Messi slipped into disorder - timeline of events
content: The city‚Äôs long wait to see the Argentine star did not last long. Messi was forced to end his lap of honour at the Vivekananda Yuba Bharati Krirangan after the crowd surged towards the field. Bottles were thrown from the stands, and security staff escorted him off the ground within minutes.

title: Watch: Samantha Ruth Prabhu and Raj Nidimoru‚Äôs first public appearance
content: Newlyweds Samantha Ruth Prabhu and Raj Nidimoru made their first public appearance post their intimate Coimbatore wedding, spotted at Hyderabad airport. Meanwhile, an unseen mehendi ceremony photo shared by Raj's sister has gone viral, showcasing the couple's joy. Their traditional Bhuta Shuddhi Vivaha ceremony took place on December 1, 2025.

title: IPL Auction: Minor fixes? After smart trading, RR eye balanced squad
content: Rajasthan Royals enter the IPL Auction 2026 with a calculated strategy after trading Sanju Samson for all-rounders Ravindra Jadeja and Sam Curran. This move addresses their long-standing structural imbalance, aiming for batting depth till eight without compromising bowling. The team also seeks a frontline Indian spinner and a pace bowling addition to complete their balanced XI.

title: 2001 Parliament attack: When terror from 'sarhad' struck Sansad
content: Terrorists attacked India's Parliament on December 13, 2001. This event brought the threat of terrorism to the nation's core. Security forces bravely fought back, preventing a greater crisis. The attack reshaped India's security architecture, leading to enhanced surveillance and intelligence sharing. It remains a critical moment in India's fight against terrorism.

title: 'Dhurandar in rebranding': Cong on renaming of MGNREGA; accuses BJP of hating Gandhi
content: The Congress criticized the Modi government for approving a bill to rename the Mahatma Gandhi national rural employment guarantee act (MGNREGA) to 'Poojya Bapu Grameen Rozgar Yojna'. The party accused the Centre of rebranding rather than reforming the scheme and attempting to erase Mahatma Gandhi's legacy from villages.

title: Drama in Australia! England security's confrontation with media - Watch
content: England's Ashes tour faces another setback as security staff clashed with a Channel Seven cameraman at Brisbane airport. The incident occurred during the team's check-in for their flight to Adelaide, adding to the team's already challenging series. This confrontation highlights ongoing scrutiny of England's tour preparations as they trail 0-2 in the series.

title: Five players who offer upside for your lineup in Week 15
content: fantasy managers should consider starting Jauan Jennings in Week 15 . the playoffs already rolling in ESPN standard leagues and plenty of formats kicking off their tournaments this week . think big-play chops here and favorable deployment based on the week 15 slate of games .

title: Chelsea ratings: Palmer, Neto, Gusto 8/10 in Everton win
content: Enzo Maresca's side moved back into the premier league's top four . the first-half goals from Cole Palmer and malo Gusto saw off a spirited performance from Everton . both goals came against the run of play at the bridge .

title: Patriots or Broncos: Breaking down the race for the AFC's No. 1 seed
content: the Denver Broncos and new England Patriots are separating from the pack in the race for the no. 1 seed . both enter this weekend with 11-2 records and are in the midst of 10-game winning streaks . payton recalls how his team was the No. 2 seed in the playoffs after the 2006 regular season .

title: We made score picks for every postseason college football game
content: the 12-team college football playoff is no longer new . there are more justifiably aggrieved teams at being left out . the annual coaching carousel always impacts the postseason . new coach Pete Golding will make his debut in the biggest game in team history .

title: MLB winter meetings winners, losers and head-scratching moves
content: the 2025 winter meetings didn't have a $700 million-plus deal like last year . but there were still a number of impactful free agent signings . veteran slugger Kyle Schwarber chose to return to the Philadelphia Phillies on a five-year deal in the first major splash of the meetings .

title: NHL trade grades: Report cards for Hughes, Jarry deals
content: the Vancouver Canucks traded Quinn Hughes to the Minnesota Wild in exchange for Zeev Buium , Marco Rossi , Liam Ohgren and a 2026 first-round pick . Throughout the season up until the March 6 deadline, ESPN reporters will be grading each side on all of the big swaps .

title: How the new kickoff rules opened doors for some of the league's most dynamic players
content: the Cowboys should soundly defeat the Vikings this week . it's rookie Chimere Dike that sits on top . the kickoff rules changes were slightly tweaked in 2024 . Isaiah Williams signed a three-year, $13.5 million contract extension in march .

title: Who Is Paige Shiver? Why her name surfaced in the Sherrone Moore controversy
content: the name Paige Shiver has recently surfaced in online discussions around football . speculation on social media has been intense, but official statements have not named her in connection with any wrongdoing . she is the daughter of a long-serving scout with the Chicago Bears .

title: Delhi air: AQI breaches 450; GRAP 4 imposed
content: Priyangi Agarwal writes on environmental and climate change issues, connecting these topics to the everyday lives of people. She tracks developments across the capital‚Äôs transport hubs‚ÄîDelhi Metro, Namo Bharat Trains, and Delhi Airport‚Äîwhile also reporting on pressing social issues. Her stories blend data analysis with voices from the ground to tell human-centred narratives. Previously stationed in western Uttar Pradesh, she focused her coverage on minority issues, health, and human rights. Read More

With an unwavering commitment to accuracy, depth, and timeliness, we strive to keep you informed about the ever-evolving world, delivering a nuanced understanding of international affairs to our readers. Join us on a journey across continents as we unravel the stories that shape our interconnected world. Read More

title: Never say die! Jawan turns Army officer; clears IMA on seventh attempt
content: despite repeated setbacks, he continued to appear for various officer entry examinations, failing each time but refusing to give up . his perseverance paid off as his family watched with pride at the Indian Military Academy in Dehradun while he donned the officer‚Äôs uniform .

title: Goa nightclub inferno: Landowner, Arpora‚ÄìNagoa sarpanch questioned; magisterial panel probes cause
content: The TOI News Desk comprises a dedicated and tireless team of journalists who operate around the clock to deliver the most current and comprehensive news and updates to the readers of The Times of India worldwide. With an unwavering commitment to excellence in journalism, our team is at the forefront of gathering, verifying, and presenting breaking news, in-depth analysis, and insightful reports on a wide range of topics. title: Kerala local body polls: UDF surges; historic win for NDA
content: Rajiv G is a senior assistant editor with the Times of India . he began his journey in 1998 with the Indian Express in Coimbatore before moving on to Deccan Chronicle in Hyderabad . since joining the Times in 2011, he has been at the forefront of reporting on the health sector .

title: J&K: Searches launched in Akhnoor and adjoining areas; Jaish terrorist arrested along border
content: security forces launched an extensive joint search operation along forward villages in Akhnoor and adjoining areas in J&K . there were no reports of any kind of suspicious movements in the area, but no chances were taken . the forces are on high alert and have asked residents of villages near the international border to immediately alert the authorities if any suspicious person is seen .

title: Deaths under 45: Heart disease main culprit; AIIMS study reveals alarming trend
content: Anuja Jaiswal is a Senior Assistant Editor at The Times of India, with an impressive 18-year career in narrative journalism. She specializes in health and heritage reporting, expertly simplifying complex health information to make it engaging and understandable for readers. Her deep dives into heritage topics are well-researched, resulting in captivating narratives that resonate with her audience. Over the years, she has worked in Chandigarh, Chhattisgarh and West UP, gaining diverse on-ground experience that shapes her storytelling. Read More

title: H-1B overhaul: Democratic states challenge Trump‚Äôs visa fee; warn blow to Indian talent
content: the lawsuit, filed in the US District Court for the District of Massachusetts and spearheaded by California Attorney general Rob Bonta, argues that the fee far surpasses what federal law allows and was implemented without proper legal procedures . the new six-figure surcharge represents an unprecedented jump .

title: Turbulent skies
content: The airline, which commands a 65% share of India‚Äôs domestic aviation market, says operations are stabilising after days of chaos that saw hundreds of flight cancellations

title: LDF consolidates dominance in Kannur district; UDF, BJP, SDPI post gains
content: The most striking outcome was in Anthoor municipality, where the LDF registered a clean sweep by winning all the 29 wards, several by huge margins

title: Key parties in Tamil Nadu draw up strategies as 2026 Assembly election draws closer
content: Early this week, Chief Minister and the ruling DMK president, M. K. Stalin ‚Äúfixed a target‚Äù of 2.5 crore votes for the formation headed by his party. The ruling party‚Äôs traditional adversary, the AIADMK, is also banking on the performance put up by it and its key ally, BJP during the 2024 Lok Sabha election

title: Nellore ZP approves budget for FY26-27
content: The budget estimates for Financial Year 2026-27 have been prepared by taking ‚Çπ61.07 crore as income and ‚Çπ61.07 crore as expenditure

title: BJP-led NDA makes it big in Thripunithura
content: The party served as the principal Opposition in the temple town, dislodging the UDF in the last two terms since 2015. It wins 21 seats in the polls to stake claim to power in the 53-member civic body. The¬†LDF¬†bags 20 seats and the Congress-led front 12 seats.

title: A.P.‚Äôs industrial policy is among the best in India, says Minister Kondapalli Srinivas
content: Kondapalli Srinivas launches products from Morris Garages (MG) and TATA Motors at the ‚ÄôBusiness Expo 2025‚Äô  in Vijayawada

title: Wanted sons, unwanted daughters: sex determination takes digital turn
content: India‚Äôs gender preference still exists in homes, except that the conversations are now mostly behind closed doors and in online spaces. Hundreds of videos and products online promote sex selection, and have now come under the government scanner. Ashna Butani uncovers how the desire for a male child, continues to be vocalised

title: T.N. has emerged as a leader in economic growth thanks to the DMK govt., says Stalin
content: He says the State has reported GSDP growth rate of 16% despite not receiving adequate support from the Centre; it has also achieved a significant milestone in per capita income, the CM adds

title: 20,000 Myanmar soldiers and 200 officials deserted, says former Army officer who sought refuge in India
content: Capt. Kaung Thu Win urges India to convey to Myanmar‚Äôs military that the ‚Äúpeople of Myanmar have rejected the election‚Äù that will take place on December 28

title: Mandate in district panchayats serves as a ‚Äòwake-up call‚Äô
content: The verdicts are believed to be indicative of the way the political wind is blowing in the State ahead of the Assembly polls. However, experts point to the case of 2010 local body polls, when a good showing in the district panchayats, did not exactly reflect in the subsequent Assembly election. LDF and UDF share 7 district panchayats this time.

title: Tiruvallur farmers gear up for Samba harvest
content: A preliminary meeting meant to discuss about Direct Procurement Centres is to be held next week for 690 revenue villages

title: J&K court issues proclamation notice against brother of arrested Kashmir doctor in terror case
content: According to the proclamation notice, Dr. Rather could not be traced despite warrants, ‚Äúforcing the court to proceed under the relevant provisions of the Bharatiya Nagarik Suraksha Sanhita

title: Anti-incumbency dashes Left‚Äôs hopes in local body polls in Kerala
content: The rout of the Left is more pronounced n¬†Kottayam,¬†Idukki,¬†Ernakulam¬†and¬†Malappuram districts, which are old citadels of the UDF. Urban voters have turned their back on the Left

title: Former CM Naveen Patnaik announces to forgo his hiked salary
content: Odisha Legislative Assembly recently passed bill by increasing salaries of MLAs and ministers by three folds

title: Revanth scores perfect political goal as Messi mesmerises Hyderabad
content: As Rahul Gandhi looked on, Revanth Reddy ensured that he shared the spotlight with his boss reinforcing his emergence as the Congress party‚Äôs most visible and confident chief ministers

title: ‚ÄòOverground‚Äô workers got government jobs, real terror victims were hounded in J&K: L-G Manoj Sinha
content: After the abrogation of Article 370, the families of terror victims have found new courage and self-confidence and are now speaking out against the terror ecosystem without fear, the L-G said.

title: Parking chaos worsens around Bengaluru metro stations, spills into residential lanes
content: Across the 96-km network, BMRCL has designated parking at 66 of the 83 stations, accommodating about 12,000 two-wheelers and 2,300 cars

title: A.P. likely to remain in grip of winter chills till December 25
content: While daytime temperatures will remain below normal in South Coastal A.P. and Rayalaseema till December 25, they are likely to be above normal in North Coastal A.P., says IMD

title: West Bengal Governor denied entry to Kolkata‚Äôs Salt Lake Stadium after vandalism during Messi visit
content: Fans protest mismanagement following footballer‚Äôs appearance; Governor says gates were shut and lights switched off

title: Hyderabad roars for Messi, as Revanth Reddy scores in a friendly match
content: A carnival air prevailed as thousands of fans of Messi waited for nearly four hours entertained by a laser show, fireworks and flamethrowers

title: Brinda Karat writes to President seeking intervention in  Dadri lynching case
content: The CPI(M) leader said that the Uttar Pradesh government, with the Governor‚Äôs consent, is attempting to withdraw the prosecution in a manner that ‚Äòsubverts the entire judicial process‚Äô

title: CM, leaders all praise for Horatti, Chairman of Council felicitated for completing 45 years as MLC
content: Chairman of Karnataka Legislative Council Basavaraj Horatti, who has already created a record for his eighth successive win from teachers‚Äô constituency, was given a grand and warm felicitation by leaders of various political parties including chief minister Siddaramaiah at Nehru Stadium in Hubballi on Saturday in the presence of thousands of teachers and well wishers from different walks of life.

title: Mines Dept. issues show-cause notice to ACC Ltd. on  limestone leases
content: Company given two weeks time to file its reply on why the leases granted to it in 2019-24, in purported violation of norms laid down by the Central government, should not be cancelled

title: Asia‚Äôs longest ski drag lift, revolving conference hall opened in Gulmarg
content: J&K CM inaugurates tourism infrastructure projects worth over ‚Çπ17 crore to boost Gulmarg‚Äôs role as premier winter destination; 726-metre ski drag lift cost ‚Çπ3.65 cr

title: UDF breaches LDF citadels in Kozhikode, NDA makes gains in urban areas
content: Though the¬†LDF¬†just managed to retain power in the 76-member¬†Kozhikode¬†Corporation council and won eight of the 12 block panchayats, it narrowly lost the district panchayat and surrendered its supremacy in¬†grama¬†panchayats to the UDF

title: Election Commission appoints new observers to monitor SIR in eight States including Bengal, T.N.
content: Five lakh booth-level officers will share the list of omitted voters with more than 12 lakh agents of political parties; special roll observers to meet political parties, officials, and ensure transparent revision

title: RTC unions and Transport Minister meet on long-pending demands
content: The meeting comes in the backdrop of an earlier discussion held between the union, Chief Minister and Transport Minister on November 26, during which the unions had reiterated their demands

title: BJP leaders says NDA now a key force in bipolar Kerala politics
content: NDA substantially augmented its ward tally, securing outright majorities in two municipalities and 19 grama panchayats. The BJP is set to send 249 members to grama panchayats, 37 to block panchayats, two to district panchayats, 320 to municipalities, and 60 to Corporations

title: Scientists teach chickens to make human proteins inside their eggs
content: If successful at scale, this method can significantly reduce the cost of producing LIF and similar therapeutic proteins.¬†Scientists say the same platform can also be adapted in the future to produce other important biomedical molecules at low cost¬†

title: UDF emerges stronger in its Ernakulam fort
content: The CPI(M)-led Left Democratic Front has been restricted to only a handful of local bodies, while the results have left the BJP-led National Democratic Alliance smiling, as it won the Thripunithura municipality

title: 3.9 magnitude tremor hits Kutch district of Gujarat, no damage reported
content: This is the fifth tremor of magnitude above 3 recorded in Kutch this month; epicentre near Gadhshisha village

title: DKS pitches Apartment Bill, seeks apartment residents‚Äô support in GBA polls
content: He¬†adds that¬†the Bill is being brought at a time when Bengaluru has grown significantly, with¬†nearly 19%¬†of its residents living in apartments

title: Sittilingi: a tribal valley‚Äôs inspiring success story
content: In Sittilingi, a valley in western Tamil Nadu, the infant mortality rate in the early 1990s was 147 babies for every 1,000 births. Today, it stands at eight. In the intervening years, the one factor that changed local dynamics and improved healthcare and general standards of living in this largely tribal belt was the involvement of a doctor couple and their dedicated team. An ear firmly invested in listening to the community‚Äôs needs, coupled with a desire to bring about positive change, has turned Sittilingi into a vastly different place today

title: KC(M) stumbles, Joseph faction gains ground in Central Travancore
content: Contesting 1,026 wards, the KC(M) could win only 243, while the Kerala Congress won 332 of the 650 seats it contested and played a decisive role in the UDF‚Äôs return to power in the Kottayam and Idukki district panchayats

title: Kerala local body polls: UDF emerges dominant in municipalities as LDF loses ground
content: Of the 86 municipalities that went to polls, UDF emerged victorious in 54, LDF in 28, and NDA in two. NDA fails to retain Pandalam, but wins Tripunithura. LDF could not hold on to Karunagapally. Independents emerge as the single largest group in Erattupetta municipality

title: ‚ÄòTraveller Nooks‚Äô in Hampi set for completion by March 2026
content: The Traveller Nooks are designed to address critical gaps in visitor facilities by providing drinking water stations, hygienic toilets, ATMs, retail kiosks and shaded resting areas.

title: Hindu organisations protest against religious preaching at government polytechnic in Tirupati
content: In a video that has gone viral on social media platforms, a contract lecturer was seen writing Telugu text on green board, equating Jesus Christ to parents and siblings

title: Kerala local body polls: LDF holds the ground outside Thrissur city, retains grip on panchayats and municipalities
content: UDF surge confined to Corporation limits as Left front maintains dominance across rural and semi-urban Thrissur. LDF retains district panchayat, wins in five out of seven municipalities

title: Karnataka caste survey report expected in January
content: The Commission has asked government departments for secondary data to understand adequate representation in government services

title: Stop AP from taking up the PNLP project: Uttam to Centre
content: Minister for Irrigation N. Uttam Kumar Reddy writes to MoJS Secretary V.L. Kantha Rao seeking clearance to PRLIS first-phase to utilise 45 tmc ft water

title: Gujarat couple, child trying to immigrate to Portugal kidnapped in Libya: Officials
content: Mehsana Superintendent of Police says that the kidnappers have contacted the relatives of the family, demanding ‚Çπ2 crore as ransom.

title: TTD to grow trees for ‚ÄòDwajasthambham‚Äô in 100 acres
content: The initiative is to ensure availability of ritually sanctified, home-grown timber for temples managed and established by the Hindu institutions, says TTD Chairman B.N. Naidu

title: From red dawn to blue wave: UDF turns despair to dominance in a matter of hours in Kochi Corporation
content: From a sense of being doomed to turning the tables on the LDF in what promised to be a cliffhanger of a contest, and finally, the sheer ecstasy of coasting easily past the simple majority mark, UDF experienced it all

title: Kerala local body polls: UDF makes inroads into Kottayam
content: The UDF wins 16 and LDF seven out of the 23 district panchayat seats in Kottayam. The UDF regains power in two of six municipalities. The Pala municipality remains inconclusive, with the UDF and LDF tied at 10 and 11 seats, respectively. The BJP led NDA managed to seize power in three grama panchayats, including Aymanam and Poonjar Thekkekara.

title: Kerala local body polls: UDF, NDA make dents in LDF‚Äôs strongholds in Alappuzha district
content: UDF wins five out of six municipalities. NDA comes second in Chengannur and Mavelikara municipalities, pushing the LDF to third spot. Though the Left front is in lead in grama and  block panchayats, it registers dip in performance

title: Local body polls: BJP makes it three in a row in Palakkad municipality
content: BJP secures 25 of the 53 seats in the municipal council. Though it fell short of a majority by two seats, the BJP being the party with the maximum number of councillors will continue to rule the municipality

title: The Hindu in School Science Fest and Ramanujan Spark Quest successfully concludes
content: Over 400 students showcased their talents at¬†the Science Fest and Maths Olympiad¬†organised by The Hindu in School at Madikeri

title: Drill on radiation leakage held at Kaiga NPCIL unit
content: A mock drill on testing preparedness in the event of radiation leak at the Kaiga atomic power generation station of Nuclear Power Corporation of India (NPCIL) was successfully conducted in the ‚Äòlikely to be radiation affected villages‚Äô of Uttara Kannada district recently.

title: Kerala local body polls: Powerful showing helps UDF shrug off the despondency of being out of power since 2016
content: The front also views the victory as a stepping stone to winning the Assembly elections in 2026. Satheesan credits ‚ÄòTeam UDF‚Äô for reasserting its political identity as the sole bulwark against Hindutva ascendancy. Mallikarjun Kharge‚Äôs post on X reflected the party‚Äôs newfound optimism.¬†UDF‚Äôs emergence as a big tent accommodating varied social groups catalysed the coalition‚Äôs ‚Äúbest performance since the first elections for local bodies in¬†1995‚Äù.¬†

title: Parents association seeks action on student suicides in A.P.
content: Expresses concern over nine student suicides within six months of the new academic year in SPSR Nellore district
